item.title: VCP5-IaaS – Exam experience
item.description: So this morning I took the VMware Infrastructure as a Service exam (VCPVCD510) to gain the VCP5-Cloud qualification. The IaaS exam is available for existing VCP5-DCV holders to take without any other pre-requisites. I am very pleased to say I finished the exam in good time and scored 466/500 â€“ the pass mark is 300. The Exam The exam itself is 85 multiple choice questions, and gives you 90 minutes to do them.
